title: The best games of the year for people who like to win
summary: Cavern Co-op is a thematic, story-driven co-op game in which you and your team of “caver” buddies explore a dark and dangerous cave. The game can be played with 2-4 people and only takes about 45 minutes. The Bigger Game is a card game for 2-8 people that has you competing to build a bigger, better board game. Eclipse is a game about managing your ship and crew as you try to survive an extremely dangerous galaxy.
